K10D0148_H0149:357a-3: skal pa mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam /

K10D0148_H0149:357a-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
K10D0148_H0149:357a-11: sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
K10D0148_H0149:357a-12: ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam /
K10D0148_H0149:357a-13: bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam /
K10D0148_H0149:357a-14: nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste /

K10D0148_H0149:357a-20: cho ga shes pa yin no //

K10D0148_H0149:357a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni /

K10D0148_H0149:357a-28: pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed

K10D0148_H0149:357b-3: 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi
K10D0148_H0149:357b-5: chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni /
K10D0148_H0149:357b-6: gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
K10D0148_H0149:357b-7: brnyes pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya

K10D0148_H0149:357b-11: 'chad par 'gyur pa de thams cad ni /
K10D0148_H0149:357b-13: ma nor ba de bzhin no //

K10D0148_H0149:357b-22: de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o //

K10D0148_H0149:357b-28: ge khong du chud par mi nus so //

K10D0148_H0149:358a-1: ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do //
K10D0148_H0149:358a-2: de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-3: ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing don
K10D0148_H0149:358a-4: thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu
K10D0148_H0149:358a-5: bar byed / sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed //
K10D0148_H0149:358a-6: bdud thams cad pham par byed /

K10D0148_H0149:358a-8: pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la
K10D0148_H0149:358a-9: chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin
K10D0148_H0149:358a-12: byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
K10D0148_H0149:358a-13: kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no
K10D0148_H0149:358a-15: chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams
K10D0148_H0149:358a-16: mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du
K10D0148_H0149:358a-17: byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o //
K10D0148_H0149:358a-18: yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-19: yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-20: yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-21: shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-22: mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-23: rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358a-24: rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0148_H0149:358b-0: rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul @358b gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /

K10D0148_H0149:358b-6: nas de 'dra ba chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs

K10D0148_H0149:358b-25: yongs su chad par rig nas sems can gang rnams
K10D0148_H0149:358b-26: yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu

K10D0148_H0149:359a-11: ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K10D0148_H0149:359a-12: dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to //

K10D0148_H0149:359a-14: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam
K10D0148_H0149:359a-15: par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par

K10D0148_H0149:359a-21: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o //

K10D0148_H0149:359a-28: tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10D0148_H0149:359a-30: lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste /
K10D0148_H0149:359a-31: lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems dpas sems

K10D0148_H0149:359b-3: rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do

K10D0148_H0149:359b-29: nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
K10D0148_H0149:359b-32: shes rab che ba'i rgyu ste /
K10D0148_H0149:359b-33: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni /
K10D0148_H0149:360a-0: dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i @360a *//

K10D0148_H0149:360a-2: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
K10D0148_H0149:360a-3: par byed do // de bzhin du dge ba'i chos

K10D0148_H0149:360a-18: btags pa tsam du zad do //

K10D0148_H0149:360a-28: nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin
K10D0148_H0149:360a-29: zhe na / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am /

K10D0148_H0149:360b-1: pas mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang
K10D0148_H0149:360b-2: 'gyur ro // yang byang chub sems dpa' ni /

K10D0148_H0149:360b-4: lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag
K10D0148_H0149:360b-5: par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad
K10D0148_H0149:360b-6: med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de /

K10D0148_H0149:360b-15: cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10D0148_H0149:360b-16: dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa /

K10D0148_H0149:360b-20: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa /
K10D0148_H0149:360b-21: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa /
K10D0148_H0149:360b-22: zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa /

K10D0148_H0149:441b-9: kyi tshig 'di dag thos nas byang chub tu sems
K10D0148_H0149:441b-10: mi skyed cing / bdud kyi las rnams mi 'dor
K10D0148_H0149:441b-11: ba de la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes rdo
K10D0148_H0149:441b-12: rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas spyi
K10D0148_H0149:441b-13: mi skyed cing / bo 'gems so // zhes thos
K10D0148_H0149:441b-14: nas bdud kyi bu de dag gis bar snang la
K10D0148_H0149:441b-15: mi skyed cing / bo 'gems so // bltas pa
K10D0148_H0149:441b-16: dang / de dag gis lag na rdo rje lnga
K10D0148_H0149:441b-17: brgya bdag bdag gi spyi bo na rab tu 'bar
K10D0148_H0149:441b-18: ba'i rdo rje thogs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de
K10D0148_H0149:441b-19: dag 'jigs shing skrag ste byang chub tu sems bskyed
K10D0148_H0149:441b-20: mi skyed cing / bo 'gems so // bltas pa
K10D0148_H0149:441b-21: dang / do // de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i
K10D0148_H0149:441b-22: dus na 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /
K10D0148_H0149:441b-23: 'dzum pa de'i don tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
K10D0148_H0149:441b-24: bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas de la bcom
K10D0148_H0149:441b-27: bdud kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag 'jigs shing
K10D0148_H0149:441b-28: skrag ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0148_H0149:441b-29: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong ngam /
K10D0148_H0149:442a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa @442a *//
K10D0148_H0149:442a-2: nam bdud sdig can de byang chub thob par 'gyur
K10D0148_H0149:442a-3: ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de dag thams
K10D0148_H0149:442a-4: cad kyang ming tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpar
K10D0148_H0149:442a-5: 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
K10D0148_H0149:442a-6: dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0148_H0149:442a-8: ji srid na bdud sdig can bla na med pa
K10D0148_H0149:442a-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
K10D0148_H0149:442a-11: de byang chub thob nas ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur /
K10D0148_H0149:442a-12: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur /
K10D0148_H0149:442a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0148_H0149:442a-15: bdud sdig can 'di da dung yang phyogs bcu'i sangs
K10D0148_H0149:442a-16: rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdud kyi bya ba byed
K10D0148_H0149:442a-17: de / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
K10D0148_H0149:442a-18: kyang rdo rje snying po nyon mongs pa rab tu
K10D0148_H0149:442a-19: 'joms pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos par 'gyur zhing
K10D0148_H0149:442a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga gsang ba dang /
K10D0148_H0149:442a-28: ci tsam gyis byang chub kyi sems de brtan par
K10D0148_H0149:442a-29: gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas
K10D0148_H0149:442a-30: dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'byung ste
K10D0148_H0149:442b-0: / de'i @442b gsung rab la bdud sdig can 'di'ang tha mar bdud kyi las byed de /
K10D0148_H0149:442b-1: de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin nas sems med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0148_H0149:442b-2: chos kyi snang ba thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
K10D0148_H0149:442b-3: rjes su song zhing byang chub kyi sems bskyed do
K10D0148_H0149:442b-4: // de'i 'og tu grangs med pa bgrang ba las
K10D0148_H0149:442b-5: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byed de
K10D0148_H0149:442b-8: ri mor byed cing mchod par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0148_H0149:442b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa
K10D0148_H0149:442b-10: la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;rab tu byung
K10D0148_H0149:442b-11: nas kyang dam pa'i chos dus gsum du yongs su
K10D0148_H0149:442b-12: 'dzin par 'gyur / sems can tshad med pa'ang byang
K10D0148_H0149:442b-13: chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro
K10D0148_H0149:442b-15: pa grangs med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi na bla
K10D0148_H0149:442b-16: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0148_H0149:442b-17: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10D0148_H0149:442b-18: rnam par sbyong ba'i bskal pa la yongs su dag
K10D0148_H0149:442b-19: par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shin tu
K10D0148_H0149:442b-20: gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba'i de
K10D0148_H0149:442b-21: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0148_H0149:442b-22: pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K10D0148_H0149:442b-23: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o //
